console-history
***************


Description
===========

An instance's serial console data. It includes configuration messages
that occur when the instance boots, such as kernel and BIOS messages,
and is useful for checking the status of the instance or diagnosing
problems. The console data is minimally formatted ASCII text.

**Warning:** Oracle recommends that you avoid using any confidential
information when you supply string values using the API.


Available Commands
==================

* capture

* delete

* get

* get-content

* list

* update
